extendedInfo.description: Stir your cooking passions and embrace the warmth of your kitchen with the Coronado Taste of Oils App! Complete with recipes, health facts and suggestions, our App allows you to enjoy every single one of our olive oils and balsamic vinegar in every way possible - in order to completely enjoy the health benefits of our fresh oils!  In addition, you can sign up directly for cooking classes, purchase olive oils and balsamic vinegar directly, and schedule your next event in beautiful Coronado, California.We look forward to sharing our recipes and helping you bring family and friends together for health and happiness.

reviews.title: Helps my cooking!
reviews.comment: As a college student I really benefited from the recipes and information on the oils. Everything I recipe I use is right here in an easy to use app!
reviews.author: Jake Schwartz

reviews.title: Really great!
reviews.comment: Amazing all the info I need to make delicious meals. Thank you!
reviews.author: roberta korte
